About Fountain View
55+ ACTIVE LIVING AT FOUNTAIN VIEW RV LOT OWNER’S ASSOCIATION, INC. IN NORTH FORT MYERS, FLORIDA
Fountain View is a welcoming 55+ community located in beautiful North Fort Myers, Florida—just minutes from the Gulf Coast’s top attractions.
With over 300 home and RV lots, our community is the ideal destination for active adults seeking a vibrant lifestyle in a well-maintained, pet-friendly setting.
Fountain View Board of Directors
Pictured From Left to Right:
Orbie Bowles
– Secretary
George Shimchick
– Treasurer
David Hitchings
– President
Harry Soard
– Vice President
Tim Lavigne
–  Director at Large
Professionally Managed by Newby Management
This community is proudly managed by Newby Management, a trusted leader in property management for over 50 years. With a focus on exceptional service and community-focused living, Newby Management oversees more than 50 manufactured home and RV communities across Florida. Our experienced team is dedicated to maintaining high standards, ensuring well-maintained properties, and creating welcoming environments where residents feel right at home.
Contact Us Today!
18961 N. Tamiami Trail N. Fort Myers, FL 33903
|
239-731-5051

For More Information on Our Community Contact Us Today!
We’re here to help. Reach out to our team anytime to learn more about life in our 55+ community in North Fort Myers, Florida
